title: Hikinukiya
overview: Saho Kanoko works for the outdoor activity equipment company Faun, which is run by her father. She works very hard at her job, but she gets fired. She is confused by her firing, which is related with someone invited to the company through a headhunter. Headhunter Kaori Watarai then appears in front of her. Saho Kanoko soon works for the headhunter company where Kaori Watarai is employed. She begins to like her new job, but those around her will sometimes resort to unscrupulous practices. Meanwhile, bad things happen to her father's company.
